TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Oid extends System.Object

summary.span: 代表密碼編譯物件識別項。

span.span: Represents a cryptographic object identifier.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 密碼編譯物件識別碼/名稱值配對所組成。Cryptographic object identifiers consist of a value/name pair. 如果配對中的一個屬性設定成已知的值，其他屬性會自動更新成對應的值。If one property in a pair is set to a known value, the other property is updated automatically to a corresponding value. 例如，如果屬性設定為"1.3.6.1.5.5.7.3.4"，已當地語系化的屬性會自動設定為 [安全電子郵件]。For example, if the property is set to "1.3.6.1.5.5.7.3.4", the property, which is localized, is set automatically to "Secure Email". ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 類別。The following code example shows how to use the class. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.Oid#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.Oid/CPP/cryptography.oid.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.Oid#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.Oid/CS/cryptography.oid.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.Oid#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.Oid/VB/cryptography.oid.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定的值和易記名稱，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified value and friendly name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式可用來針對現有的值複製物件。This constructor can be used to copy the values of an existing object. 請注意，如果無法辨識的 Oid 值、`value`和`friendlyName`參數不會驗證以判斷它們對應到彼此。Note that if the Oid value is not recognized, the `value` and `friendlyName` parameters are not verified to determine if they correspond to each other. 這是因為有物件識別碼，.NET Framework 無法辨識，即使應用程式可以將它們解譯。This is because there are object identifiers that the .NET Framework does not recognize, although an application may be able to interpret them. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 類別。The following code example shows how to use the class. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.Oid#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.Oid/CPP/cryptography.oid.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.Oid#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.Oid/CS/cryptography.oid.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.Oid#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.Oid/VB/cryptography.oid.vb#1)]

Public Property FriendlyName As String

summary.span: 取得或設定識別項的易記名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the friendly name of the identifier.
The friendly name of the identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果的其中一個值屬性設定成已知的值，其他值屬性會自動更新成對應的值。If one value of an property is set to a known value, the other value of an property is updated automatically to a corresponding value. 例如，如果屬性設定為 [安全電子郵件]，屬性會自動設定為"1.3.6.1.5.5.7.3.4"。For example, if the property is set to "Secure Email", the property is set automatically to "1.3.6.1.5.5.7.3.4". ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 類別。The following code example shows how to use the class. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.Oid#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.Oid/CPP/cryptography.oid.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.Oid#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.Oid/CS/cryptography.oid.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.Oid#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.Oid/VB/cryptography.oid.vb#1)]
